definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)

sentences.english: There's a lot to see and do there.
sentences.chinese: 那兒有很多可看的東西和可做的事情。

sentences.english: In end of July, there's the Malibu Art Festival, which has a bit of everything.
sentences.chinese: 在七月底，則是馬利布藝術節，有很多可看的東西。

sentences.english: In contrast to applications, often can help to improve the visual image can be worth watching.
sentences.chinese: 對比的應用，往往能使畫面提高視覺可看性。

sentences.english: Lion Head Hill is not worth seeing except for its old temples.
sentences.chinese: 除了那些古寺以外，獅頭山沒什麼可看的。

sentences.english: Apart from being a departure point for Yangtze River cruises, Chongqing had little to see.
sentences.chinese: 除了它是揚子江遊船的出發點外，重慶沒什麼可看的。

sentences.english: But beauty gives you something extra to look at.
sentences.chinese: 可是美貌給予你更多的可看性。

sentences.english: However, the format of its information content does not have to see sex.
sentences.chinese: 但其信息內容的格式不具備可看性。

sentences.english: Lion HeadHill is not worth seeing except for its old temples.
sentences.chinese: 除了那些古寺以外，獅頭山沒什麼可看的。

sentences.english: Lion Head Hill is not worth easysting except to its old temples.
sentences.chinese: 除了那些古寺以外，獅頭山沒什麼可看的。

sentences.english: She continued reading, or seeking for something to read.
sentences.chinese: 她繼續看書，或者找些什麼可看的。

sentences.english: Things to see and things you can do is like unlimited in here.
sentences.chinese: 這裏可看可做的事情好像數不盡似的。

sentences.english: Why aren’t there any good movies anymore?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼現在都沒有好電影可看了？

sentences.english: We're gonna be left with a big hole in the ground and nothing to show for it.
sentences.chinese: 給我們剩下的就是個大坑，沒什麼可看的。

sentences.english: Do you think there is valuable nature the television which is for the moment sees?
sentences.chinese: 你們認爲如今的電視有可看性嗎？

sentences.english: It used to be the altar here. Now there is nothing to look at.
sentences.chinese: 這兒以前是聖壇，現在卻沒什麼可看的了。

definition: qualities that make sth worth seeing (or reading)
pleasant to the eye/Taiwan pr. [zhong4 kan4]
easy to deal with/not a problem/(polite answer) you flatter me
can't see/can't make out/unable to tell
to appear to be/to seem as if
to be mindful/to pay attention to/to take note of
to look upon/to take a fancy to/to fall for
